name: Subway
long_description: You find yourself in a cavernous space completely covered in pale tile, giving your footsteps a sweet-sounding echo. Excessive greenish fluorescent lighting floods the space and saps the color from the mostly organic stains on the ground and walls. A dense rumble precedes the arrival of each subway, which greets you with an unintelligible squawking of multilingual vowels and jingles. A much abuse trashcan cowers in the far corner. To one side a phone booth advertises the cityâ€™s best psychic and liquor delivery services.
short_description: An underground transport system complete with garbage receptacle and touch tone communication interface.

room_features.name: Phone Booth
room_features.description: People have probably wasted a lot of money in this broke down Phone Booth.

room_features.name: Trash Can
room_features.description: One's trash is another's treasure, right?
